attributes.additional_details: This Government was elected by the votes of only 33.7% of the eligible voters using a manifesto that was false and is unable to govern responsibly. Polls suggest that the majority of British people, including Labour voters, would like a General Election immediately to rectify the situation.
attributes.background: Vote for a General Election to come immediately!

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Dissolve Parliament and call a General Election now!
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/750050
